title: LFM Plat+
body:
Currently recruiting to fill extra spots on a ranked team that is currently gold 3 on the ladder (8/11 wins)
Mix is currently plat/diamond players.

If you have:
A good attitude towards team play.
Log in regularly between 6-10pm AEST time weekdays and during the day weekends
Confidence in laning against diamond players

Then add me! IGN: Neosinf

replies.body: I am interested. In game: Condescend. I have added to speak further

Added you in game : Skillz that kill 

would like a look in, what roles are you looking for? 

Plat player.
